t: Amazon: brand value 2024 | Statista
s: What makes Amazon stand out from many of the world's most valuable retail brands is its focus on e-commerce and the platform's extensive global availability. While U.S.-based competitors such as Walmart mainly operate in North America, Amazon serves millions of users across the globe.
